metadata.title: DPM Dar receives newly appointed German Ambassador

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Oct 2 (APP):Deputy Prime Minister/Foreign Minister (DPM/FM), Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar on Thursday received newly appointed Ambassador of Germany, Ina Lepel and wished her a successful tenure in Pakistan. The Deputy Prime Minister/Foreign Minister stressed the importance of strengthening bilateral political, trade and investment ties, climate action, skilled labour mobility, defence and education cooperation, a DPMas Office news release said.
